gime,"2011-01-16T19:57:27.767Z","another great minifig from S2","

I've bought this one to complete my collection.

Box/Instructions

Standard bag with barcodes, so it's pretty easy to pick the right one.
Standard Minifigures folded instruction.

Parts

I like the customized skis and sticks. Hat is good too.

Minifigures

He seems to be a pro-skier taking part in some kind of competition as he wears a starting number. Design and colors are great. Head-piece is also good but with that forced smile he looks a bit dumb.

The build

It's a bit tricky to make him hold skis and sticks at the same time.

The completed model

Looks awesome. No quality problems.

Summary

Very good example from Minifigures S2. Excellent for collectors to put on a display but probably less usable in real play.
